item.title: Basic R
item.description: R Programming Language # Introduction # R is a robust programming language and environment designed for statistical computing and data analysis.

item.title: DS chapter-1
item.description: Data Science # Introduction to Data Science # Definition # Data Science is an interdisciplinary field that leverages scientific methods, processes, algorithms, and systems to extract insights and knowledge from structured and unstructured data.
